channel.title: <3 mySQL sources - Step By Step Guide - Request
channel.description:
I've bought an official website, no more [b]free[/b] webhosts or .100mb.com crap. I've bought a real website and i would love for someone to share there knowledge.
Basically, i want to put my mySQL Dodian ( Or haven ) source online. I've asked alot of people but they ignore. I'm not looking for a smart remark. Just some help.
Yes i used google.com and the search bar. No one seems to be helping. So i thought i'd ask the experts <3.
Thank you very much. <3
p.s : a step by step guide would be lovely. pm me if u wish.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2009, 11:11:53 pm[/size][hr]bump
